title: Magento
shortDefinition: The company — its full name is "Magento Commerce" and legally is called "Magento, Inc." — includes several products in the following categories: digital commerce, order management, and other industry solutions. The Magento term is a registered trademark and a company name.
usage: Use as an adjective but do not use as a noun in any form. For example, Magento system, Magento namespace, and so on.
